dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page

Class AbstractResultWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page.AbstractResultWidget
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangedDCtxtsResultWidget

    public abstract class AbstractResultWidget
extends java.lang.Object
    To implement a custom result widget, this class has to be extended. A result widget like the backend and page of a wizard is registered via the extension-point: dreisoft.tresos.guidededconfig.api.plugin.guidedconfigwizard: 
      <extension point="dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.plugin.guidedconfigwizard"<
     <guidedconfigwizard id="guidedDemo1"<
        <backend ...>
        <gui ...>
        <resultGui class="test.tresos.plugin.guidedconfig.backend.MyResultWidge"/>
     </guidedconfigwizard>
  </extension>

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

        Parameters:

      • getBackend

        public AbstractBackend getBackend()
        Get the corresponding backend. This can be used to query results besides the statusList, to provide more information to the user
        Returns:
        The AbstractBackend
